com.aware
Class Applications

java.lang.Object
  AccessibilityService
      com.aware.Applications

public class Applications
extends AccessibilityService

Service that logs application usage on the device. Updates every time the user changes application or accesses a sub activity on the screen. - ACTION_AWARE_FOREGROUND_APPLICATION: new application on the screen - ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATION_ADDED : new application installed - ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATION_REMOVED: application removed - ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATION_UPDATED: application updated - ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATIONS: applications running was just updated

Author:
denzil

Nested Class Summary
static class Applications.ApplicationMonitor
          BroadcastReceiver for Applications module - Monitor for changes in running foreground/background applications: ACTION_AWARE_FOREGROUND_APPLICATION - Monitor for changes in installations on the device: Intent#ACTION_PACKAGE_ADDED, Intent#ACTION_PACKAGE_REPLACED, Intent#ACTION_PACKAGE_REMOVED
static class Applications.ApplicationsProvider
          AWARE Applications Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded applications on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/applications.db
static class Applications.AwareMonitor
          Received AWARE broadcasts - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE - ACTION_AWARE_CLEAN_DATABASES
static class Applications.BackgroundService
          Applications background service - Updates the current running applications statistics - Uploads data to the webservice
 
Field Summary
static String ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATION_ADDED
          Broadcasted event: new application has been installed
static String ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATION_REMOVED
          Broadcasted event: an existing application has been removed
static String ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATION_UPDATED
          Broadcasted event: an existing application has been updated
static String ACTION_AWARE_APPLICATIONS
          Broadcasted event: new foreground and background statistics are available

          Broadcasted event: a new application is visible on the foreground
static int BACKGROUND_APPS_UPDATE_FREQUENCY
          How often we check what is running on the background (default = 30 seconds)
